20 year term plap. Large face amounts for low premiums, whole life (level premiums). Plans are portable. Cover yourself and/or your dependents. For groups of 15 employees or more, can offer Guaranteed Issued Life Insurance up to $100,000 with no health questions.
product.rates: Male, non-smoker, age 31 can get $100,000 for $5.32 per week

product.details: Large network of providers. $15 co-pay for annual exams. $25 co-pay for lenses. Frames covered up to $130 and up to $130 for contacts.
